extends java.lang.Object

Franklin University

Method Detail

addItem

public boolean addItem(MediaItem item)
Adds an item to the library. The call number within the item does not exist in the library, the copy number within the item will be set to 1 by this method. If the copies of the item already exist in the library, the copy number will be set to the next copy number. For example, if the highest copy number is 3, the item added will be copy number 4.

Specified by:
addItem in interface Library
Parameters:
item - the item to be added to library.
Returns:
true if the item was added successfully, and false if the item was not added.

                                    java.util.GregorianCalendar endDate)
Returns the difference between the supplied dates in days.

Parameters:
startDate - the starting date
endDate - the ending date
Returns:

checkIn

public boolean checkIn(java.lang.String callNumber,
                       int copy)
Checks an item back into the library. The borrower id and due date are set to null in the item.

Specified by:
checkIn in interface Library
Parameters:
callNumber - the call number of the item to be checked in
copy - the copy of the item to be checked in
Returns:
true if the item was checked in successfully, and false if it was not.

checkOut

public java.util.GregorianCalendar checkOut(java.lang.String callNumber,
                                            int copy,
                                            java.lang.String borrower,
                                            java.util.GregorianCalendar dateCheckedOut)
Checks out an item from the library. The borrower id and due date are set in the item. The due date is set to 30 days from the current date.

Specified by:
checkOut in interface Library
Parameters:
callNumber - the call number of the item to be checked out
copy - the copy of the item to be checked out
borrower - the id of the person borrowing the item
dateCheckedOut - the date the item was checked out.
Returns:
the due date if the item was checked out successfully, and null if is was not.

deleteItem

public boolean deleteItem(java.lang.String callNumber,
                          int copy)
Deletes a item from the library.

Specified by:
deleteItem in interface Library
Parameters:
callNumber - the call number of the item to be deleted.
copy - the copy number of the item to be deleted.
Returns:
true if the item was deleted successfully, and false if the item was not deleted.

findItems

public MediaItem[] findItems(java.lang.String callNumber)
Creates and returns an array of media items that match the call number. The length of the returned array is equal to the number of media items that match the call number, and each element in the array is one of the matching media items.

Specified by:
findItems in interface Library
Parameters:
callNumber - the call number of the media items
Returns:
an array of matching media items.

getItems

public MediaItem[] getItems()
Creates and returns an array containing all items in the library.

Specified by:
getItems in interface Library
Returns:
the array

readFromFile

public static AnytownLibrary readFromFile(java.lang.String fileName)
                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Recreates the library from a persisted object file. The file should have been created by serialization of a prior library object.

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the file containing the library object
Returns:
the AnytownLibrary object read from the file
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

public java.util.GregorianCalendar renew(java.lang.String callNumber,
                                         int copy,
                                         java.lang.String borrower,
                                         java.util.GregorianCalendar currentDate)
Adds 14 days to the due date of the given book, and returns the new due date.

Specified by:

Parameters:

borrower - the borrower id

Returns:

searchItems

public java.util.List<MediaItem> searchItems(java.lang.String criterion)
Creates and returns a list of media items that match the criterion. If the MatchMaker was not set prior to this method being called, the method will return null. If no items are found, the method will return an empty list.

Specified by:
searchItems in interface Library
Parameters:
criterion - the search criterion
Returns:
a list of matching media items or null.

setMatchMaker

public void setMatchMaker(MatchMaker matcher)
Sets the match maker object that encapsulates the search algorithm.

Specified by:
setMatchMaker in interface Library
Parameters:
matcher - the object to be used to find items in the library

Throws:
